name: Reality Maps
description: This wad is a limit-removing wad designed for Boom compatibility (-complevel 9) for MAP01-02, and Vanilla compatibility (-complevel 2) for MAP03. The maps are intended to be played "Reality" style, which means you can't get hurt at all. Play on Ultra-Violence if you want to start with 1 health or play on the other difficulties if you want to start with 100 health.
